Install testing

remote <- devtools:::github_remote("hadley/devtools", ref = "1ce84b04568ff7846c3da754f28e7e22a23c8737",
                                   auth_token = devtools:::github_pat(quiet), host = "https://api.github.com")
bundle <- devtools:::remote_download(remote, quiet = FALSE)
## Downloading GitHub repo hadley/devtools@1ce84b04568ff7846c3da754f28e7e22a23c8737
## from URL https://api.github.com/repos/hadley/devtools/zipball/1ce84b04568ff7846c3da754f28e7e22a23c8737
# from install_remote
# on.exit(unlink(bundle), add = TRUE)
# source <- source_pkg(bundle, subdir = remote$subdir)
# on.exit(unlink(source, recursive = TRUE), add = TRUE)
# metadata <- remote_metadata(remote, bundle, source)
# install(source, ..., quiet = quiet, metadata = metadata, 
#         out_dir = out_dir, skip_if_log_exists = skip_if_log_exists)
